shots: Action shots of Joe performing painting services (e.g., detail work, prepping a wall)
Action shots of Joe performing handyman services (e.g., fixing something, consulting with a client)
High-quality 'after' shots of completed painting projects (clean walls, crisp lines, modern aesthetic)
Shots demonstrating professionalism and attention to detail
photographyBrief.style: Clean, professional, authentic, bright, and trustworthy. Emphasize professionalism and craftsmanship.

types: Modern, clean illustrations or vector graphics for header/hero sections (abstract paint swatches, stylized home elements)
High-quality lifestyle images depicting happy homeowners in freshly painted spaces (if client portfolio is limited)
Background textures (subtle paint strokes, clean wall textures)
stockRecommendations.style: Contemporary, bright, clean, professional, and inviting. Avoid generic clip art.

images.description: A modern, professional graphic or abstract illustration representing painting and handyman services, suitable for a website header. Should be clean and convey quality.
images.purpose: Primary header graphic, replacing the dated clip art.
